title: "Smiths Detection Launches Lithium Batteries Algorithm for Cargo and Checked Baggage System"
excerpt: "Smiths Detection has launched a new lithium batteries algorithm for the HI-SCAN 10080 EDX-2is, its dual-view air cargo and checked-baggage screening system. The algorithm has been designed to provide automatic detection of lithium batteries in all freight and baggage screened for explosives by the HI-SCAN 10080 EDX-2is,"
